text: (napiye!) Itu nam um mitu irakkiya mikka pakkiyamutaiya oru vetamakum.Itu tanakku munnulla (avarkalutaiya vetat)taiyum unmaip patuttukiratu. Akave,nir (itaik kontu taynattinarakiya) makkavacikalukkum, ataic curri ullavarkalukkum accamutti eccarikkai ceyviraka. Evarkal marumaiyai nampukirarkalo avarkal ivvetattaiyum (avaciyam) nampuvarkal. Avarkal tavaratu tolutum varuvarkal
